ygData.subject: Re: Maximals Attack!/Sunhawk's return(council read)
ygData.msgSnippet: Two Vok beings appear appear above his spark. Vok 1:  Do we need this one. Vok 2:  No the 2 we have will suffice. They dissapear. ... As fire fills the area

Two Vok beings appear appear above his spark.

Vok 1:  Do we need this one.

Vok 2:  No the 2 we have will suffice.

They dissapear.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> A look of horror comes over DrillBit's face, as the bombs go off. 
As fire fills the area and the force blows out the corridors, and 
shrapnal goes all over, DrillBit is blown back through the back wall 
as well. His exo-skeleton is blown into many pieces, and organic 
parts are burned away. In the end a pile of what used to be DrillBit 
lays, with a spark barely hanging on, as it sparks, and throbs.
